title: Yossi Benayoun
summary: Yosef Shai "Yossi" Benayoun[1][2] (Hebrew: יוסף שי "יוסי" בניון‎, born 5 May 1980) is an Israeli former professional footballer who last played for Beitar Jerusalem[6] and captained the Israel national team. He played as an attacking midfielder, often occupying the space just behind the striker. Born in Dimona, he is sometimes nicknamed "The Diamond from Dimona" in Israel.
